text: I wasn't looking for another marriage. I had been married before. He is a nice man - a geologist, an Ernest Hemingway type. But Paul and I married because of convention.
author: Linda McCartney

text: If it's not working before you get married, marriage isn't going to fix it.
author: Courtney Thorne Smith

text: I was a Christian. I didn't want to have sex before marriage, I was a bit uptight and not very self-confident. I was a virgin until I was 26.
author: Jimmy Carr

text: I think the Mother is gradually revealing itself to me and taking over. But it is not the Mother alone. It is the Mother and the Father, the male and the female, sort of gradually having their marriage.
author: Bede Griffiths

text: When a marriage culture fails, sexual desire no longer unites instead it fragments.
author: Maggie Gallagher
